comment.text: The translation key "RoomGroupRemove" is used to display the message "Group removed". It is likely displayed when a group of rooms has been successfully deleted or removed from a specific setting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Премахнати групи" (Removed groups) is too literal and doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of "Group removed". It implies multiple groups were removed, while the English indicates a single group.
The English phrase "Group removed" implies a single group was removed. "Ryhmät poistettu" translates to "Groups removed", which is a plural. This might be inaccurate depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ryhmä poistettu' if a single group was removed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Group removed' implies a single group was removed. The Armenian translation 'Խմբերը հեռացվել են։' translates to 'Groups were removed' which implies multiple groups were removed. This changes the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating to 'Խումբը հեռացվել է։' which translates to 'Group was removed'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກຸ່ມຖືກລົບອອກ' literally translates to 'Group was removed out'. While understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Lao. A more natural translation would convey the action of removing the group, rather than emphasizing its state after removal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກຸ່ມຖືກລຶບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'කුழு ඉවත් කරනු ලැබුවා' while understandable, is a passive voice construction. A more direct and natural translation would be preferable. 'කුழு ඉවත් කරන ලදී' or 'කුழு ඉවත් විය' would be better alternatives.
While 'Група уклоњена' is technically correct, it sounds a bit formal and impersonal for a UI element like this. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'Уклоњена група'.
